title: MD
biography:
Sunil Arora is a retired IAS officer of Rajasthan Cadre who served as the 23rd Chief Election Commissioner of India. 
He is also the chairman for Association of World Election Bodies (A-WEB). He also served as a secretary to the Government of India in two ministries.
aiSummary: Sunil Arora is a immunization strategy specialist with an H-index of 110 at Public Health (Faculty). Has been published in Science, Digestive Diseases and Sciences. Based in India.
